    • Method Detail

      • getTranslation

        public java.lang.String getTranslation()
        Gets the translation. The phonetic or sounds-like translation for the word. A phonetic translation is based on the SSML format for representing the phonetic string of a word either as an IPA translation or as an IBM SPR translation. A sounds-like is one or more words that, when combined, sound like the word.
        Returns:
        the translation

      • getPartOfSpeech

        public java.lang.String getPartOfSpeech()
        Gets the partOfSpeech. **Japanese only.** The part of speech for the word. The service uses the value to produce the correct intonation for the word. You can create only a single entry, with or without a single part of speech, for any word; you cannot create multiple entries with different parts of speech for the same word. For more information, see [Working with Japanese entries](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/services/text-to-speech?topic=text-to-speech-rules#jaNotes).
        Returns:
        the partOfSpeech

      • setTranslation

        public void setTranslation(java.lang.String translation)
        Sets the translation.
        Parameters:
        translation - the new translation

      • setPartOfSpeech

        public void setPartOfSpeech(java.lang.String partOfSpeech)
        Sets the partOfSpeech.
        Parameters:
        partOfSpeech - the new partOfSpeech
